name: Daily Dinner
description:
Daily Dinner is a Short Thriller Indie Game. The game takes place at your house and it's Dinner time... Bon appetit.

This is my first project as a Game Developer and I'm so thankful to my friend Daniel for helping me in this project being an amazing 3D Artist. I can't thank him enough ❤❤❤ 

This Game was made for Game Jaaj 6 but I still want to try and improve this game so watch out for Updates!

Daniel Artstation

Hope You Enjoy Daily Dinner!
